channel.title: Indie Maker Start - 让小产品的独立变现更简单
channel.description: Write an awesome description for your new site here. You can edit this line in _config.yml. It will appear in your document head meta (for Google search results) and in your feed.xml site description.

item.title: Maker: Levels
item.description: list: [ { “img”: “http://qiniu.gafata.com/2019-06-01-levelsio.png?imageView2/2/w/100”, “link”: “https://levels.io/”, “title”: “Levels”, “desc”: “I’m the maker of Nomad List.” }, { “img”: “http://qiniu.gafata.com/2019-06-01-pat.jpg?imageView2/2/w/100”, “link”: “https://twitter.com/thepatwalls”, “title”: “Pat Walls”, “desc”: “Rather not talk about it just do that shit!” }, { “img”: “http://qiniu.gafata.com/2019-06-01-liziran.jpg?imageView2/2/w/100”, “link”: “https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCgLUl1WDoDXUtxPaZeSZHsw”, “title”: “李自然说”, “desc”: “有趣的灵魂，聊科技人文。” }, { “img”: “http://qiniu.gafata.com/2019-06-01-charles.jpg?imageView2/2/w/100”, “link”: “https://charlesngo.com/”, “title”: “Charles”, “desc”: “I teach people how to create a business online using affiliate marketing.” }, { “img”: “http://qiniu.gafata.com/2019-06-01-dan.jpg?imageView2/2/w/100”, “link”: “https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCs_6DXZROU29pLvgQdCx4Ww”, “title”: “Dan Lok”, “desc”: “After 13 failed businesses, Dan finally became a self-made millionaire at age 27 and multi-millionaire by age 30.” }, { “img”: “http://qiniu.gafata.com/2019-06-01-pierre.jpg?imageView2/2/w/100”, “link”:
